code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{Row,Form,Col}from"react-bootstrap";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{search}from"../store/actions/searchAction";import useDebounce from"../utils/useDebounce";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SearchBox(_ref){let{searchProps,value,setValue,placeholder,actionType}=_ref;const dispatch=useDispatch();const debouncedSearchTerm=useDebounce(value,500);const{...rest}=searchProps;rest["searchString"]=value;useEffect(()=>{if(actionType){dispatch({type:actionType});}if(debouncedSearchTerm){dispatch(search(rest));}},[dispatch,debouncedSearchTerm,actionType]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{style:{backgroundColor:"#495b7a",height:"3rem",justifyContent:"center"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{xs:10,sm:6,lg:5,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form,{className:"d-flex justify-content-center my-2",style:{height:"2rem"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Control,{type:"text",placeholder:placeholder,"aria-label":"Search",value:value,onChange:e=>setValue(e.target.value)})})})});}export default SearchBox;
